DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to find out what effect the combination of letrozole (brand name: Femara) and dasatinib (brand name: Sprycel) has on metastatic breast cancer compared to letrozole alone
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Phase II Trial of Letrozole With or Without Dasatinib as First and Second-line Treatment for Hormone Receptor-positive, HER2-negative Post-menopausal Breast Cancer That is Unresectable, Locally Recurrent or Metastatic
